chart.title: Antidepressant drug consumption per 1,000 people
chart.subtitle:
Daily intake of antidepressants per 1,000 people, calculated as the 'defined daily dose'. 
This enables us to compare overall levels of drug consumption, accounting for the fact that different antidepressants have different recommended dosages.
